dct_description_sm: par Robert de Vaugondy ; corrigée par Lamarch ; gravé par E. Dussy.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Milles hebraiques" and "Milles romains".
Shows topography, drainage, territories of the twelve tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Appears in Delamarche's Institutions geographiques. Paris, 1795.
